column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I have been here many times now. I have tried different options each time and not once was I disappointed. So far this is my favorite place in Houston to get ramen. Anything spicy is really good! If you want spicy get the double inferno. However
column2: it is very spicy and takes away from the broth. You have been warned! Other than the food itself
column4: the service is always friendly and helpful
column5: and the atmosphere is pretty nice.
